statement: The README should describe how run policies are enforced server-side across queue/submit/poll/finalize and how the Lab supervisor mirrors (not overrides) those policies, clarifying infra synchronization and retry controls.
rationale: RunPolicy is persisted on runs and re-checked in batch queue, submit, and poll workflows; Lab uses the same schema to configure local scheduling.
keyAssumptions: Readers need to understand which controls are authoritative (server) vs advisory (lab).
validationCriteria: README includes a policy enforcement flow and notes that lab config should stay in sync with run policy.
critiquePoints: May require simplification to avoid too many knobs in README.
questions: Do we want a short operator checklist for policy sync between lab and server?
